definitions.definition: Of, related to or connected with syntax .
examples: The sentence “I saw he” contains a syntactic mistake.

definitions.definition: Containing morphemes that are combined in the same order as they would be if they were separate words e.g. greenfinch

main_definition: Of, related to or connected with syntax .
secondary_definitions: Containing morphemes that are combined in the same order as they would be if they were separate words e.g. greenfinch
